entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
